title: Who’s Behind the CDC? | Guests: Rep. Chip Roy & Bill O’Reilly | 7/30/21
description:
Glenn and Stu debate whether they’d rather take the red pill or blue pill. Is there any part of the Bill of Rights that’s still being upheld? Rep. Chip Roy joins to discuss his fiery speeches to Congress calling out mask mandate hypocrisy during the border crisis and denouncing a new push to draft women. Bill O’Reilly takes on the week’s top stories: Who’s actually making the calls at the CDC? Is Simone Biles a hero? Will COVID-19 tank Biden? Glenn announces the newest book from BlazeTV’s Dave Rubin, “Don’t Burn This Country,” and Dave joins to explain why he was suspended by Twitter right before his yearly sabbatical from the internet. Glenn gives the one reason why he would buy a Hunter Biden painting.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
